Article.ArticleTitle: New-onset sarcoidosis in a patient with long COVID.

Abstract.AbstractText: Long COVID, often following SARS-CoV-2 infection, may stem from sustained inflammation, overlapping with autoimmune diseases like sarcoidosis. Though specific treatments lack, this link could shape future diagnostic and therapeutic methods.
